about.me: We are Malaysians who want to participate in the Cardano network as we believe DeFi is the future. We are glad to be part of the 100 pools chosen for the second cohort of 2021 to receive the IOG delegation fund. We are grateful to IOG in recognising our contribution to the Cardano ecosystem.
about.server: We have 4 bare metal nodes and 1 Oracle cloud server relay node. The bare metal nodes comprise of 3 relay nodes and 1 block producing node. As fans of the ARM SBCs, 2 of our bare metal relay nodes are run from Raspberry Pi 4B 8GB units whilst our block producer is powered by the Firefly ROC-RK3588S-PC with binaries built from source for the aarch64 architecture. Our final bare metal relay is an AMD64 Linux PC.
